Html: Is it possible for you to provide VB versions of your templates and snippets? I know that we VB'ers are in the minority but there are some of us out here. Thanks

Hi,

VB Snippets are available from http://mvvmlight.codeplex.com/SourceControl/network. I am not the author, however.

In VNext, I would like to integrate VB templates too.

Cheers,

Laurent
Were the VB templates ever integrated in version 4 of the toolkit? I would also be interested.
